author: lightclient
content:
Thank you all for the feedback over the weekend. I think the Builder API spec is in a pretty good place now -- I want to continue moving forward, so tomorrow I will merge the PR into `ethereum/builder-specs` and cut a release. Wednesday or Thursday, I'll send out a "meta-spec" that will include everything CL teams need to get started implementing and testing.
https://github.com/ethereum/builder-specs/pull/2

author: tersec
content: been tracking these in Nimbus, e.g., https://github.com/status-im/nimbus-eth2/pull/3622 which is how/why finding issues to begin with
